channel.title: Comments on: Course Landing Page: Lessons From 6-Figure Launches
channel.description: Steal the Secrets of the Best Marketers on the Internet by Studying Their Landing Pages

item.title: By: David Oudiette
item.dc:creator: David Oudiette
item.description: Thanks Vera! Don't hesitate to shoot me an email and tell me what you thought about the book.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Vera! Don’t hesitate to shoot me an email and tell me what you thought about the book.

item.title: By: Vera
item.dc:creator: Vera
item.description: You just sold me your book with this article. Great, extremely useful content! Thank you so much. I learned a ton. And I hope to learn (and apply!) even more after reading your book.
item.content:encoded: You just sold me your book with this article. Great, extremely useful content! Thank you so much. I learned a ton. And I hope to learn (and apply!) even more after reading your book.

item.title: By: Mira
item.dc:creator: Mira
item.description: And I forgot. In the begining I was looking for informations about what to say in the short vidéo like Derek's. I'm gonna to look for in your other works but maybe you have some quick tips. I will be grateful to read your point of view about content for this kind of introduction vidéo.
item.content:encoded: And I forgot. In the begining I was looking for informations about what to say in the short vidéo like Derek’s. I’m gonna to look for in your other works but maybe you have some quick tips. I will be grateful to read your point of view about content for this kind of introduction vidéo.

item.title: By: Mira
item.dc:creator: Mira
item.description:
You're article - your work on this - is WAW awesome incredible fantastic. As Ramona said it helps me so much.
You're analysis is precise with points that show you know what you're talking about.
I benefit from it and from the link with Noah Kagan.
Thank you. Sincerely. I wish you all the best.
I am not in the field of webmarketing so this type of post really helps. It's like the Ultimate Guide to Building Sales Page like a Pro.
I improve my sales page from what you write. Especially with the different plans and the 19th point about demonstrability of the product.
I don't know yet when I'll be able to do my launch but I want to come back to tell you the results with my brand new sales page and I'm gonna to look forward to know your work.
Thanks again ! Mira.
item.content:encoded:
You’re article – your work on this – is WAW awesome incredible fantastic. As Ramona said it helps me so much.

You’re analysis is precise with points that show you know what you’re talking about.

I benefit from it and from the link with Noah Kagan.

Thank you. Sincerely. I wish you all the best.

I am not in the field of webmarketing so this type of post really helps. It’s like the Ultimate Guide to Building Sales Page like a Pro.

I improve my sales page from what you write. Especially with the different plans and the 19th point about demonstrability of the product.

I don’t know yet when I’ll be able to do my launch but I want to come back to tell you the results with my brand new sales page and I’m gonna to look forward to know your work.

Thanks again !
Mira.

item.title: By: Ramona
item.dc:creator: Ramona
item.description:
I was actually trying to study their pages (Ramit's especially, I think he's crazy good with this type of stuff), but it's so much to take into, especially for someone who's now learning marketing ..
Your article really came at the right moment, since it pin-pointed EXACTLY where I can improve.
I was able to sell few tens of spots for my freelancing course, but I do feel there's way more potential and I'd love to make more sells (of course).
Really appreciate ALL the tremendous work you're doing here and can't wait for more insights like these. I'm a 'convert' for YLPS right now
item.content:encoded:
I was actually trying to study their pages (Ramit’s especially, I think he’s crazy good with this type of stuff), but it’s so much to take into, especially for someone who’s now learning marketing ..

Your article really came at the right moment, since it pin-pointed EXACTLY where I can improve.

I was able to sell few tens of spots for my freelancing course, but I do feel there’s way more potential and I’d love to make more sells (of course).

Really appreciate ALL the tremendous work you’re doing here and can’t wait for more insights like these. I’m a ‘convert’ for YLPS right now

item.title: By: David Oudiette
item.dc:creator: David Oudiette
item.description:
Thanks, sounds like that's right up your alley!
There's definitely a LOT you can learn from these guys, I could have made that article a loooot longer if I'd started digging into the details, that's why I included the full landing pages along with it. :)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, sounds like that’s right up your alley!

There’s definitely a LOT you can learn from these guys, I could have made that article a loooot longer if I’d started digging into the details, that’s why I included the full landing pages along with it. :)

item.title: By: Ramona
item.dc:creator: Ramona
item.description: Wow, incredible insights. Have been reading your articles for 2 hours already and I'm in awe. I try to sell a very small freelance course and this will help me tremendously. Now I'll go to sleep (it's midnight here) and tomorrow I'll start making changes. Really appreciate all the great content here and the ebook is a killer as well :)
item.content:encoded: Wow, incredible insights. Have been reading your articles for 2 hours already and I’m in awe. I try to sell a very small freelance course and this will help me tremendously. Now I’ll go to sleep (it’s midnight here) and tomorrow I’ll start making changes. Really appreciate all the great content here and the ebook is a killer as well :)
